questiontext.text: A pure coin is tossed 200 times. The random variable X is: the number of times head is on top. Is X a binomial variable and if so, what are n and p? (p.323, 8.32, knowledge binomial distribution)_____________________________.

answer.text: X is not a binomial variable.

feedback.text: X is not a binomial variable…: Incorrect

answer.text: X is a binomial variable, with n = 200 and p = ½.

feedback.text: X is a binomial variable, with n = 200 and p = ½…: Correct

answer.text: X is a binomial variable, with n = 200 and p = 1/200.

feedback.text: X is a binomial variable, with n = 200 and p = 1/200: Incorrect

answer.text: X is a binomial variable, with n =1/2 and p = 200.

feedback.text: X is a binomial variable, with n =1/2 and p = 200…: Incorrect
